TCS.title: TCS National Qualifier Test (NQT)
TCS.registrationProcess: Visit the TCS NQT registration page, create an account, and register for the National Qualifier Test.
details: Explore TCS NQT: [TCS NQT](https://learning.tcsionhub.in/hub/national-qualifier-test/)
Create an account on the TCS iON platform.
Register for the National Qualifier Test.
Select the relevant job role and exam category.
Pay the registration fee, if applicable.
Complete the registration process as guided by TCS.
TCS.selectionProcess: Online test (Aptitude, Verbal Ability, Programming Logic, Coding), Technical Interview, HR Interview.
TCS.interviewProcess: Technical interviews followed by HR interviews.

Infosys.title: INFOSYS LTD.
Infosys.registrationProcess: Create an account on the Infosys portal, explore job opportunities, and apply for positions that require an aptitude test.
details: Visit the Infosys careers page: [Infosys Careers](https://www.infosys.com/careers/)
Create an account on the Infosys portal.
Explore the available job opportunities.
Apply for positions that require an aptitude assessment.
Follow the instructions provided to complete the registration process.
Prepare for the aptitude test using Infosys' recommended resources.
Infosys.selectionProcess: Aptitude tests, technical interviews, and HR interviews.
Infosys.interviewProcess: Technical interviews followed by HR interviews.

details: Visit the Wipro careers portal: [Wipro Careers](https://careers.wipro.com/)
Create an account on the Wipro portal.
Navigate to the 'Job Openings' section.
Apply for the desired position with an aptitude assessment.
Complete the application process as guided by Wipro.
Access Wipro's aptitude test preparation materials for better readiness.
WIPRO.selectionProcess: Aptitude tests, technical interviews, and HR interviews.
WIPRO.interviewProcess: Technical interviews followed by HR interviews.
